```{r}
library(plotly)
ay <- list(
  tickfont = list(color = "red"),
  overlaying = "y",
  side = "right",
  title = "second y axis"
)
fig <- plot_ly()
fig <- fig %>% add_lines(x = ~1:3, y = ~10*(1:3), name = "slope of 10")
fig <- fig %>% add_lines(x = ~2:4, y = ~1:3, name = "slope of 1", yaxis = "y2")
fig <- fig %>% layout(
    title = "Double Y Axis", yaxis2 = ay,
    xaxis = list(title="x")
  )

fig
```
